metadata.title: CVE-2013-7458 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
linenoise, as used in Redis before 3.2.3, uses world-readable permissionsfor .rediscli_history, which allows local users to obtain sensitiveinformation by reading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis-sentinel - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
redis-server - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
redis-tools - 2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.0.6-1ubuntu0.2').
